query:
SELECT 
  i.id, 
  i.vesselTagNumber, 
  i.vesselName, 
  i.status,
  i.inspectionDate,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tmlReadings WHERE inspectionId = i.id) as tml_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nozzleEvaluations WHERE inspectionId = i.id) as nozzle_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM calculations WHERE inspectionId = i.id) as calc_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM externalInspections WHERE inspectionId = i.id) as ext_count
FROM inspections i 
WHERE i.vesselTagNumber = '54-11-067'
ORDER BY i.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 1;
